p:
The TRICOLORE trial compares bevacizumab + mFOLFOX6 or CapeOX with bevacizumab + IRI + S‐1. Representative prospective clinical trials comparing fluoropyrimidines (FIRIS, SOFT, NO16966, and AXEPT) in mCRC have shown that the PFS rates of 5‐FU, capecitabine, and S‐1 are comparable.
22 ,
23 ,
24 ,
25 Therefore, we believe that our findings can be used to compare the clinical outcomes of OX‐based and IRI‐based therapies.
